broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection (any type of internet other than a dial-up)
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} has a broadband connection.
